SEO_DESCRIPTION: I'm Luis Velasco, a software engineer specialized in web development. This is my portfolio, where you can find information about my experience, projects, and blog.

SEO.PROYECTOS_DESCRIPTION: On this page, you'll find a list of projects I've worked on throughout my career. Some of them are personal projects, while others are client-based.
SEO.BLOG_DESCRIPTION: This is the blog of Luis Velasco, a software engineer specializing in web development. Here, you'll find articles on technology, software development, and best practices.

SOBRE_MI_DESC: Software Engineer with 3+ years of full‑stack experience, focused on modern architectures, FinTech solutions, and AI‑driven apps. Expert in Next.js, NestJS, React, Laravel, and Python, with hands‑on experience implementing LLMs using tools like LangChain for process automation and optimization. Passionate about innovation, system scalability, and building products with real impact.
TECH_FAVORITAS_DESC: Throughout my career, I’ve worked with various technologies. I have a passion for exploring new libraries, frameworks, and programming languages. Here’s a list.
EXPERIENCIA_DESC: My professional experience has focused on web application development, both frontend and backend. Here's a summary of my experience.

EXPERIENCIAS.AFIF_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Designed and optimized a billing platform evolving toward an ERP. Achieved >30% faster processing through code refactoring, external service integrations, and query optimization. Implemented CI/CD with Docker (cut deployment times >40%), led architecture improvements for scalability and maintainability, integrated Meta API for bulk invoice delivery and automated campaigns, and built a scheduling system with concurrency handling using Next.js, NestJS, TypeScript, and rule.js.
EXPERIENCIAS.GENESIS_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Designed and implemented an intelligent analysis solution using the OpenAI API and LLMs for automated proforma comparison via image processing. Integrated flows with LangChain and FastAPI for efficient, scalable processing in an agile environment.
EXPERIENCIAS.MANACLOUD_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Contributed to the development of a meal reservation platform that improved organizational control by allowing users to reserve meals for the company cafeteria. My responsibilities included implementing CRUD operations for managing periods, meals, and schedules in the admin section. I also helped develop the main user interface for meal reservations.

EXPERIENCIAS_MPOWERTRADE.MPOWERTRADE_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Led requirements gathering and functional design for a corporate landing page built with Astro. Optimized images and SEO to improve load speed and search visibility. Enhanced UX with effective CTAs to increase conversion and implemented key metrics for continuous optimization.

PROYECTOS_DESC: Here, you'll find a list of projects I’ve worked on throughout my career. Some of them are personal projects, while others are client-based.

PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_UTRACE_DESC: Mobile app for emotional wellness tracking with React Native. Features daily mood logging, activity monitoring, and visual progress reports with Firebase sync.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_MICRO_SHOP_DESC: Microservices architecture demo with NestJS simulating an e-commerce platform. Showcases distributed systems with independent services for users, products, and orders.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_POKEDEX_DESC: RESTful API with full CRUD operations for Pokémon management. Built with NestJS, MongoDB, and Docker for scalable data handling.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_ANT_DESC: AI-powered web scraper automating traffic citation analysis from Ecuador's ANT. Uses Playwright for data extraction and Gemini AI for intelligent processing with email/Telegram notifications.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_OUTIFY_DESC: 3rd place at Hack the Future. AI-driven trip planner with personalized itineraries, budget automation, and real-time coordination via Google Calendar, WhatsApp & Telegram. MVP in 7 hours.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_IAN_DESC: 2nd place at HackIAthon. RAG multi-agent system optimizing construction bidding with LangChain & OCR. Features document analysis, RUC validation via scraping, and risk scoring dashboard.

PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_ROSVEP_DESC: Modern corporate landing page for brand-boosting services. Features responsive design with Astro, optimized SEO, and conversion-focused CTAs.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_GENESIS_DESC: Full-stack intelligent proforma analyzer powered by OpenAI. Automatically compares prices from uploaded images, highlights best deals, and generates comparative tables using LangChain & FastAPI.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_PUCEM_DESC: Healthcare management system for PUCEM University covering medicine, physiotherapy, and nursing. Built with Next.js for efficient patient monitoring in Portoviejo.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_MPOWERTRADE_DESC: Empowerment platform for women entrepreneurs with Astro. Delivers strategic consulting, content creation, and digital transformation services with optimized UX and conversion tracking.
